授業目的:
Science Fiction and Philosophy
The purpose of this course is to enable students to recognize, understand, and analyze common philosophical themes in Science Fiction.
到達目標:
Students will be able to understand the basic argument made by each genre.
Students will be able to summarize the basic argument made by each genre.
特記事項: この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

第7回: Artificial Intelligence - designing our own destruction? Simulation theory.

第11回: Case study 2  I, Robot - what is life?
第12回: Case study 3 Frankenstein - a monster misunderstood?
第13回: Case study 4 The Matrix - are we in a simulation?
第14回: What makes for good science fiction?
